name: wetsuit
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a piece of clothing, usually made from rubber, that covers the whole body closely and is designed to keep you warm when you are swimming, especially in the sea, for long periods: divers in wetsuits
Creative Crop/Photodisc/GettyImages
